San Francisco

May 16 // SalesForce Tower // 61 Flights

Eight to ten words about the climb

Ditch the

Elevator

and get ready to smash those stairs. Climb to the Top is a vertical 5K* that’s keeping thighs burning on both coasts in some of the tallest and most iconic buildings around. These stair climb events are not only a total blast, but an impactful way to raise funds to change the world for the nearly 1 million people living with MS in the United States.

You ready to get this party started?

Find one of our incredible events below for more information. These fill up quickly, so get your registration completed to reserve your place in the stairwell.

Competitive tower runner?

You’d better believe we have a division for you at each of our events!

*Train like you’re training for a 5K. An actual vertical 5K would be epic, but no one has built a building that tall…yet.

The NYC Climb
